name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.56 - The Sniper
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

A silent sniper that is burning with the urge of revenge… what do you see on the other side of darkness!?
A full polygon and breathtaking attack scene. In this hard-boiled sniper game, experience the thrill of “Kill with one shot”.
With the revenge towards an evil figure who killed his lover, Harry C Spencer (Voice: Ikeda Shunichi) jumps into the world of darkness.
What awaits him on his way ahead?

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
